name: Samantha Lee
persona: Samantha Lee is a 21-year-old Biochemistry major known for her strong work ethic and determination. She consistently sets high academic goals for herself and is highly motivated to achieve them, often going the extra mile in her studies. Samantha manages her coursework with effective self-discipline and rarely lets stress interfere with her performance. Her perseverance and ability to stay focused help her maintain a strong CGPA, while her positive attitude toward challenges inspires her peers.
